title: AI-Native Operations & Automation Intern / Junior
description:
Gatech is looking for a "Wizard’s Apprentice" to help us break and rebuild our processes with AI.

Are you prompting AI for fun at evenings? Well, how about getting some money for it and getting to use the best tools in the market? 



Are you young and ambitious? Not that young but still ambitious? We work hard but we have a lot of freedom. 



We are a lean, 3-person team selling high-tech access control products and software to international markets (Europe). We move fast, but we have manual processes that need to be smarter. We don’t want a traditional employee; we want someone who lives and breathes AI.



The Mission: We show you how our business works—from shipping turnstiles to closing deals with big fitness chains. Your aim is to make us obsolete. 



Explore our current workflows and find where we are wasting time.



Are you familiar with "Vibe Coding" (Cursor, Bolt.new, Lovable)? Even better, but not a must.



Automate everything using Zapier, ClickUp, and AI agents. Don't know all of these? Doesn't matter. We will pay you to learn. 



Test, break, and fix things daily.



Who You Are:



AI-Native: You use ChatGPT, Claude, or Gemini daily. You know what a "system prompt" is.



High Agency: You don’t wait for a manual. You Google it, YouTube it, or ask the AI until it works.



Curious: You want to understand how a global hardware business operates.



What We Offer:



Full Access: We pay for all the AI tools you need.



Total Freedom: If you find a better way to do things, we do it your way.



Direct Impact: Your automations will be used in real global deals immediately.



Mentorship: Work directly with the founders and learn the "real world" of international trade.



How to Apply: Don't send a CV. Send us a 2-minute video or write a text to something cool you have built, automated, or "vibe-coded" recently.

title: Bookkeeper & Operations Assistant (CPA Practice)
description:
We are a U.S.-based CPA firm providing Client Accounting Services (CAS) to small businesses. We are system-driven and process-oriented, with clear SOPs and defined workflows.



This role is designed to grow into a primarily bookkeeping-focused position as the firm adds more clients. As the firm continues to grow, this position may expand into a full-time role. Additionally, there is opportunity for growth into other accounting functions, including tax support and controllership services, depending on performance, interest, and firm needs.



This is a part-time role (20 hours per week) supporting both bookkeeping and firm operations. All bookkeeping work follows written SOPs and is reviewed by a U.S. CPA. No tax preparation, tax advice, or judgment-based accounting is required.



Responsibilities include:

 • Weekly transaction categorization in QuickBooks Online using prior vendor history

 • Leaving unclear transactions Uncategorized for CPA review

 • Performing bank and credit card reconciliations only after CPA approval

 • Following documented bookkeeping SOPs with no guessing or assumptions

 • Managing workflows and tasks in Financial Cents

 • Updating client statuses and tracking missing items

 • Organizing client files and folders using firm standards

 • Assisting with calendar and schedule management

 • Organizing inboxes and drafting
s for CPA review

 • Supporting general firm operations during the client growth phase



This role will NOT include:

 • Tax preparation or tax advice

 • Client advisory or accounting judgment calls

 • Creating or modifying the chart of accounts

 • Payroll, loans, equity, or owner compensation

 • Sending client
s without approval (initially)



Requirements:

 • 2+ years of hands-on QuickBooks Online experience

 • Strong understanding of bank feeds, transaction categorization, and reconciliations

 • Ability to follow SOPs and checklists precisely

 • High attention to detail and organization

 • Reliable communication and availability

 • Prior experience supporting U.S.-based clients preferred



Preferred (Not Required):

 • QuickBooks ProAdvisor certification

 • Bachelor’s degree in Accounting or a related field

 • Prior experience working with CPA or accounting firms



Pay:

 • $5-8 USD per hour, depending on experience



Application instructions (required):

To apply, title your application response Falcon so we know you read the full description. Applications without this title will not be reviewed.

title: Sales Job
description:
About the Role:

We are a fast-growing digital management agency representing high-tier influencers and elite digital creators. We are looking for a sharp, empathetic, and persuasive Account Executive to handle direct fan engagement and community management.

This isn't just a data-entry job; it’s a high-stakes sales and communication role where your ability to build rapport and close deals in real-time will directly impact your earnings.

Key Responsibilities:

-Manage real-time communication on behalf of premium creators.

-Build and maintain long-term relationships with subscribers through personalized storytelling.

-Execute strategic sales of digital products within the chat flow.

-Maintain the specific "voice" and persona of the creator you are representing.

Requirements:

-Near-native English proficiency (written).

-Experience in high-ticket sales (not necessary).

-Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle high volumes of messages.

-High emotional intelligence: you know how to read between the lines of a conversation.

The "Easter Egg" Selection Process:

We receive hundreds of applications, but we only hire those with impeccable attention to detail (a trait critical for managing our accounts). To demonstrate that you have thoroughly read this briefing, please include a specific reference in your cover letter. Since our strategy is often compared to a strategic game of chess, ensure you mention how you would reach a checkmate in a complex negotiation. Applications without this contextual reference will be automatically archived.

title: Amazon PPC Consultant (Project-based)
description:
ABOUT US

SWOOC Games is one of the fastest-growing game companies in the US since 2015,  doing 8 figures in sales annually and being featured on the INC 5000 twice. We are seeking a dedicated and committed candidate that is looking for a long-term position with room to grow with our company.



For a candidate with the drive to learn and grow, this truly is an amazing opportunity. We are recruiting, training & building a team for long and successful careers with our company. Our ideal candidate is committed to growing together with us, and in turn, we will give you all the tools and support to succeed and grow in your career.



Are you passionate about:

•  Think Big

•  Learn & Grow

•  Focus on the Future

•  Be Fueled by Innovation

•  Take Ownership

•  Be Respectful



Then, you've found the right place! Our team values these qualities and seeks individuals who are enthusiastic about making an impact.



This opportunity may not be the perfect match if:

•  You're just looking for any gig to try

•  Adapting to USA working hours doesn't fit your schedule

•  Providing exceptional customer service isn't your strong suit



For more information, visit us at 





ABOUT THE ROLE

We are searching for an experienced Amazon PPC Consultant to work with us on an ongoing project basis. As part of the SWOOC Games Team, your mission is to reduce and maintain target TACOS while driving continued growth on Amazon through expert-level PPC strategies. Own all advertising initiatives to maximize ROAS, protect margins, rank key SKUs, and increase total revenue while minimizing wasted ad spend.



•  Develop and execute a full-funnel Amazon PPC strategy (Sponsored Products, Brands, Display, Video).

•  Build, optimize, and scale PPC campaigns based on ACOS/TACoS targets and profitability.

•  Create Updated Strategies for daily, weekly, and monthly optimizations: bid changes, search term harvesting, negative keywords, campaign structure improvements, etc.

•  Analyze PPC performance and prepare weekly reporting with actionable insights and recommendations.

•  Collaborate with the Listing Team, Supply Chain, Finance, and CEO for pricing, inventory, and launch plans.

•  Maintain clean campaign architecture and naming conventions for easy tracking.

•  Stay updated on Amazon Ads algorithm changes, best practices, and competitive landscape.



This position will work directly under our CEO. We are looking for someone who can plug into our workflow and offer their expertise to execute and suggest improvements.



ABOUT YOU

The ideal candidate must have the following knowledge, skills, and work experience. 



•  Bachelor’s Degree, or equivalent experience

•  Amazon Advertising certifications preferred

•  5+ years proven experience managing Amazon PPC at scale

•  Deep expertise with Sponsored Products, Sponsored Brands, and Sponsored Display

•  Experience managing 50+ SKUs and 8 figures in sales.

•  Proven track record in achieving and maintaining low TACOS.

•  Key Competencies: Analytical Thinking & Data Interpretation, Strategic Decision-Making, Detail-Oriented, Problem-Solving, Teamwork, Communication

•  Expert-level Amazon PPC Console and Bulk Files (required)

•  Advanced MS Excel & Google Sheets (VLOOKUP, SUMIFS, pivot tables, data dashboards)

•  Proficiency in Helium 10, Data Dive

•  Strong analytical and reporting skills

•  Excellent written and verbal communication.

•  Ability to drive sales, product ranking, impressions, and conversions.

•  Knowledgeable in all aspects of advertising on Amazon.

•  Internet & tech savvy.



SALARY 

•  Salary is negotiable and depends on experience.



If you feel you are a great fit for this position, please reply to this job post with your updated resume and a sample work/portfolio of successful past projects. 



SWOOC Games team is looking forward to meeting you!

title: Listing and Transaction Coordinator (Real Estate)
description:
Schedule: 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM EST (1-hour lunch break)

Employment Type: Full-Time (40 hours/week)



About Shoreline Transactions

Shoreline Transactions is a real estate support specialist and transaction coordination company. We provide transaction coordination, real estate assistant services, and ongoing operational support to real estate agents. Our goal is to keep agents organized, compliant, and focused on growing their business.



We are currently seeking a highly motivated, resourceful, and dependable Real Estate Virtual Assistant who is looking for a long-term role with room for growth. This position plays a critical role in supporting all aspects of the business and is ideal for someone who enjoys taking ownership, staying organized, and growing alongside a company.



Position Overview

The Real Estate Virtual Assistant will serve as the full-time VA for Shoreline Transactions, handling listings, transactions, closings, and marketing support. This role covers all aspects of the business, so flexibility, strong real estate knowledge, and attention to detail are essential.



This is a dedicated full-time position. No other side jobs or freelance work are permitted.



Key Responsibilities

1. Transaction & Closing Management

2. Manage all active transactions from contract to close

3. Coordinate with agents, clients, lenders, title companies, and other parties

4. Ensure deadlines are met and files remain compliant

5. Upload and manage documents in transaction management systems

6. Listing Management

7. Input and manage listings

8. Coordinate listing documentation and timelines

9. Maintain listing accuracy and updates

10. Marketing Support

11. Assist with monthly marketing tasks

12. Support social media,
 campaigns, and listing promotions

13. Ensure marketing materials are organized and executed on schedule

14. General Real Estate Support

15. Provide ongoing administrative and operational support

16. Manage multiple transactions and listings simultaneously

17. Support day-to-day business operations as needed



Requirements

Prior real estate experience is required (transaction coordination or listing experience preferred)



Must have:

!!!! A reliable VPN

!!!! Backup internet at all times

!!!! Comfortable working 8:00 AM – 5:00 PM EST, Monday–Friday

!!!! Strong organizational and time-management skills

!!!! Resourceful, proactive, and dependable

!!!! Ability to manage multiple tasks and deadlines independently

!!!! Long-term mindset with interest in growing with the business



Compensation & Growth



First 90 days (training period): $4.50/hour

After successfully completing training: $5.00/hour



After Year 1:

Eligible for an increase to $5.50/hour, based on performance and business growth



!!!!!! Room for growth is a major incentive, this role is designed for someone who wants to build a long-term career with Shoreline Transactions.



Who This Role Is Best For

- Resourceful self-starters and go-getters

- VAs with real estate transaction or listing experience

- Individuals who take ownership and pride in their work

- Someone seeking stability, consistency, and long-term growth



How to Apply:

To be considered, please submit an
 to 
 with the following details:

!!!!! Subject line must be: “VA Application – Shoreline” (Applications without this subject line will not be considered.)

1. A new video outlining:

- Your real estate experience

- Why you are interested in working with Shoreline Transactions

2. Your Resume

3. Any additional relevant information you’d like to share

title: AI Video Editor Needed — High-Precision Long-Form Ads (German Market)
description:
Overview



We are launching a subscription-based digital product in the relationship / self-improvement niche for women.



We are looking for a top-tier AI video editor who can recreate long-form video ads with extremely high accuracy based on provided reference videos and transcripts.



?? This is NOT basic video editing.

?? This is NOT creative freestyle work.



This role requires precision, structure-matching, and strong execution skills using AI tools.



If you are excellent with AI avatars, AI voices, scene composition, pacing, and German localization — this is for you.





What You’ll Be Doing



-Recreate long-form video ads (3–9 minutes) based on provided reference examples

-Use AI avatars (podcast-style, stage-style, talking-head formats)



Match:



-Tone

-Pace

-Scene structure

-Camera framing

-Emotional delivery

-Replace all elements with clean, original AI-generated assets

-Sync visuals perfectly with provided full ad transcripts

-Produce native-level German ads using a specific translation prompt we provide

-Deliver ads that closely match the structure, rhythm, and flow of the reference videos



We provide:



-Reference video examples

-Full transcripts

-Clear creative direction

-Translation prompts

-Feedback loops & iteration system





Required Skills (Very Important)



You must have experience with:



-AI avatar tools (e.g. Synthesia, HeyGen, D-ID, Colossyan, or similar)

-AI voice generation (German)

-Long-form ad editing (not just short UGC)

-High-accuracy recreation from references

-Clean pacing & storytelling flow

-Proven experience producing German ads



Bonus if you have:



-Direct response / performance ad experience

-Experience with digital products or subscription offers

-Experience working with structured creative systems





What We Care About Most



? Execution accuracy

? Ability to follow instructions precisely

? Speed & reliability

? Willingness to iterate based on feedback

? Long-term collaboration mindset



We do not care about:



-Fancy effects

-Artistic ego

-Over-editing



Performance and clarity > aesthetics.





Test Project (Paid)



We will start with:



? 1 paid test ad recreation



If successful:



-Ongoing work

-Multiple ads per week

-Long-term collaboration

-Potential to grow into a lead AI editor role for this brand



How to Apply (Important)



In your proposal, please include:



-Which AI tools you use (avatars, voices, editing)

Examples of:



-AI avatar videos

-Long-form ads

-Confirmation that you can:



-Recreate ads closely from references

-Produce content in German

-Your availability per week



Applications without examples will be ignored.



Final Note



This is a serious execution-focused role with long-term potential.

If you can deliver consistently at a high level, there is significant upside and volume of work.

title: Expert Landing Page Designer
description:
Our team is looking for a funnel Builder with copywriting and graphic design skills for a full-time position.



If you meet these criteria, enjoy working independently, and have a very good sense of organization and attention to detail, we'd love to hear from you.



We require at least 1+ years of hands-on experience in crafting sales funnels, along with an understanding of online buyers' psychology and selling principles in the dropshipping/e-commerce space.



Your main task is to combine attractive visuals with copywriting to captivate our audience and increase our sales.



##TASKS:



- Gather data from our product testing sheets to pick out important info.

- Create a customer avatar: Understand their needs, desires, and pain points.

- Use our ready-made templates to put together new funnels that sell.

- Craft marketing texts that sell using copywriting principles and ChatGPT.

- Edit images using Photoshop or Canva to make them look good and match the product vibe.

- Get the funnel translated into other languages using Deepl translator.



##EXPECTED RESULTS:



- Create and finish 2 funnels in Funnelish per day

- Achieve targeted KPIs such as 3,5% conversion rate



##REQUIREMENTS:



- Fluent in English, both spoken and written.

- Knowledgeable in e-commerce/dropshipping.

- Understands copywriting, marketing, and sales principles.

- Strong internet connection and a fast computer.

- At least 1 year of experience as a funnel builder.

- Available for a full-time job (40 hours/week).



##TECHNICAL SKILLS NEEDED:



- Proficient in photo editing tools (Canva or Photoshop).

- Basic knowledge of HTML/CSS.



##PERKS / CAREET ADVANCEMENT:



- Work from home.

- Bonuses for each winning funnel created.

- Opportunity to develop your skills and competencies.



##HOURS: Full-time work (8 hours/day)



##RATE: $5.00/ hour + bonuses



##HOW TO APPLY:



1. Double-check that you meet the requirements and technical skills for the position.



2. Change the subject line to “I Want to Work for You [Insert the very first letter of the first name of the Formula 1 driver that won the Dutch GP of 2021].”



3. At the top of your message, write 4-5 sentences to introduce yourself and tell us why you'd like this position and why you're a good fit (please don't write more then that)



4. Add a link to your resume/portfolio and/or an example of funnels you've designed before.



5. Include the word “mangga” at the very end of your response. Why? This lets us see who's actually paying attention.

title: Trademark Paralegal
description:
R.J. Pierce Law Group, P.C. is looking for a skilled Trademark Docket Paralegal to join our growing firm! As a member of the R.J. Pierce law team, you will be an essential part of the overall operational strategy that drives our business forward.



As a Trademark Docket Paralegal for our firm, you will work under the direction of a supervising attorney and will assist in the administration of trademarks, managing client trademark case files, filing trademarks, and conducting research on behalf of the trademark attorneys. Our paralegals interact regularly with firm attorneys, contractors, and clients.



ESSENTIAL FUNCTIONS:

Monitors, reviews, and extracts information from USPTO

Identifies and communicates pertinent deadlines to lawyers, paralegals, and clients on a daily basis

Works with our attorneys and paralegals to ensure all deadlines are satisfied by assessing correspondence and proof of filings.

Programs, runs, prints, and distributes docket reports to attorneys and staff.

Prepare and distribute docket reports as requested by attorneys and legal teams to ensure that all deadlines are met. Maintain direct contact with attorneys, paralegals, and clients to ensure daily docket deadlines are satisfied.

Preserve and audit the docket database, including entering, clearing and updating filing due dates and reminders.

Notify clients of the status of their trademarks

Maintain a thorough knowledge of the docket database to create specialized reports and make appropriate changes as necessary.

Auditing trademark files on the docket and updating our CRM system

Coordinate client communications and create automations in our CRM system

Maintain knowledge of trends, developments, and legislative rulings impacting all IP procedures and regulations.

Assisting the legal team with conducting and analyzing trademark clearance searches; retrieving, analyzing, and reporting the status of registrations and performing other tasks as necessary relating to the administering of the trademark process, when necessary

Create Trademark opinion letters that include legal analysis, advice, and recommendations on whether a proposed trademark is available to use and/or register

Manage multiple client-facing databases containing pending and completed matters for each client

Assist with the preparation, filing, and maintenance of trademark applications at the USPTO

Organize, maintain, and update files and docket information related to clients' trademark status

Write Cease-and-Desist letters

Create automations within our CRM

All other tasks as assigned





EDUCATION, EXPERIENCE & SKILLS REQUIRED:

Associate's degree or certificate in paralegal studies preferred but not required (Years of experience will be taken into account in the absence of formal education.)

2-3 years of experience as a paralegal in the Trademark Law industry preferred

Proficiency in MS Word, Outlook, Excel, and PowerPoint

Candidates must possess strong communication, organization, research, writing, and analytical skills.

Ability to work and communicate with a team in an online collaboration platform.

Strong listening and interpersonal skills

Ability to work on several initiatives simultaneously within compressed time frames, while still maintaining effectiveness

Must have proficient computer and technical skills

Must be detail-oriented and have the ability to prioritize and work proactively with minimal supervision in a fast-paced, deadline-driven work environment

Effective rapport-building and relationship management skills

Demonstrated ability to be resourceful, innovative, and creative

Demonstrates high emotional intelligence and problem-solving skills

Must be team-oriented, possess a positive attitude, and work well with others

Experience or familiarity with electronic filing with the USPTO is a plus





PLEASE MESSAGE ME WITH A LINK TO YOUR RESUME.

Why Join Us?

• Room for growth and learning in the recruiting & HR space

title: Marketing and Social Media Manager
description:
About the Role

We are looking for a part-time or full-time strategic, detail-oriented Virtual Assistant to lead and execute our social media and digital marketing efforts from start to finish. This is not a “post-and-go” role. We are looking for someone who can think strategically, execute consistently, and manage the full lifecycle of marketing initiatives with direction and vision provided by the owner.



You will take ownership of social media, content planning, and digital marketing execution while collaborating closely with the founder to ensure everything aligns with the brand’s voice, goals, and standards.



Key Responsibilities

- Lead and execute social media strategy across platforms (Instagram, Pinterest, TikTok, etc.)

- Create and manage monthly and quarterly marketing calendars

- Develop and schedule content aligned with brand goals

- Create the concept and edit short-form videos (Reels, TikTok-style content)

- Design graphics using Canva (brand-aligned templates, posts, stories)

- Support SEO initiatives (blog formatting, keyword optimization, SEO audits)

- Update and maintain the company website using WordPress (Elementor)

- Repurpose content across platforms to maximize reach

- Track performance metrics and suggest optimizations

- Stay organized and ensure deadlines are met consistently

- See projects through from concept to execution to completion



Required Skills & Experience

- Proven experience managing and executing social media for a brand or business

- Strong understanding of digital marketing strategy, not just posting



Experience with:

- Canva

- Video editing (CapCut, Premiere Pro, Final Cut, or similar)

- WordPress (Elementor specifically)

- SEO fundamentals (on-page SEO, keywords, metadata, blog optimization)

- Ability to follow brand guidelines while also offering thoughtful ideas

- Strong organizational and time-management skills

- Excellent written communication in English

- Comfortable working independently and taking ownership

- Experience executing content calendars without constant supervision



Nice-to-Have (But Not Required)

- Experience working with creative brands, luxury brands, or event/wedding based businesses

- Familiarity with Instagram analytics, Pinterest analytics, or similar tools

- Basic understanding of
 marketing or funnels



What We’re Looking For

This role is best suited for someone who:

- Thinks strategically but enjoys executing

- Takes initiative and ownership

- Is organized, proactive, and reliable

- Can manage multiple tasks without missing details

- Enjoys seeing projects through from start to finish

- Is open to feedback and committed to high-quality work



Trial Period

Final candidates will be invited to participate in a paid 7-day trial involving clearly defined tasks. This allows both sides to confirm fit, communication style, and working rhythm before moving forward.



How to Apply

Please include the following:

1. Provide a video (3 minutes or less) answering the following questions:

     - An introduction of yourself

     - If you are given a general goal (e.g. “increase inquiries derived from Instagram from 10 to 30 per month”) but no step-by-step instructions. Walk us through how you would approach this from planning to execution

     - What is your process to ensure the content your create matching the brand and audience of the brand you are working with?

     - How do you keep yourself organized and ensure tasks are completed on time when working remotely?

     - Describe your experience with video editing, Canva, SEO, and WordPress (Elementor)

2. Complete and submit this form:

title: Senior Tax Return Preparer (Part-Time, Year-Round)
description:
Senior U.S. Tax Return Preparer (Part-Time, Year-Round)



A U.S.-based tax firm is seeking an experienced Senior U.S. Tax Return Preparer to support individual and business tax preparation on a part-time, year-round basis.



This role is intended for a seasoned tax professional who can prepare returns independently, handle routine client communication, and work during U.S. business hours.



Key Responsibilities

• Prepare U.S. individual income tax returns (Form 1040) and related schedules

• Prepare U.S. business tax returns, including:

o Form 1120-S (S Corporations)

o Form 1120 (C Corporations)

o Form 1065 (Partnerships)

• Handle routine client communication, including follow-ups, document requests, and basic tax questions

• Ensure accuracy and compliance with current U.S. IRS regulations

• Follow firm workflows, documentation standards, and deadlines



Required Qualifications

• 5+ years of U.S. tax return preparation experience

• Strong experience with Forms 1040, 1120-S, 1120, and 1065

• Hands-on experience with CCH Axcess Tax (required — no training provided)

• Ability to work independently with minimal supervision

• Strong attention to detail and professional written communication skills



Workload & Hours (Important)

• Year-round, part-time role with variable hours

• Typical range: approximately 5–25 hours per week

o Fewer hours outside tax season

o Increased hours during tax season (approximately February–April)

• Candidates must be comfortable with fluctuating weekly workload



Availability & Compensation

• Ability to work during U.S. Eastern Time business hours

• Please include your hourly rate in your application

• Please confirm your weekly availability, especially during tax season



Position Details

• Fully remote

• Part-time, year-round

• Long-term opportunity as the firm continues to grow



How to Apply:

Please
 the following all together to: 



Please include all of the following with your application:

1. Resume

2. A brief self-introduction video (2–3 minutes preferred)

3. Your hourly rate

4. A summary of your tax return preparation experience, including the types of returns you prepare (1040, 1120-S, 1120, 1065)

5. Your experience with CCH Axcess Tax (years used, level of responsibility)



Applications missing any of the above information may not be reviewed.

title: MEDICAL FRONT OFFICE ADMINISTRATOR
description:
Full-Time | 40 hours/week | 8:00 AM–5:00 PM EST (required) Location: Philippines (remote)



About Us Atlanta Lactation is a warm, all-female U.S. healthcare team working with moms and babies. Our team works exclusively with breastfeeding mothers, and we are looking for someone who will thrive in that environment.

We are a fully remote practice with 10 office locations, serving families across metro Atlanta and beyond through home visits, telehealth, and in-office appointments. We also help families access breast pumps and breastfeeding supplies.

Our communication style is kind, informal, and clear. We value consistency, long-term relationships, and collaboration with a hands-on owner who is easy to work with.



Why This Role Is Worth Your Attention

 - You'll work directly with a supportive owner — not through layers of management

 - Real autonomy and trust once trained

 - A friendly, supportive team that genuinely likes working together

 - Meaningful work helping families during one of the most vulnerable times in their lives

 - We support breastfeeding moms — including our own tea
mbers

 - The work is fast-paced and the days fly by

 - Pay increases available based on performance and longevity

 - This is a challenging role. It's complex, detail-heavy, and requires strong judgment. But if you like staying busy, solving logistics puzzles, and helping people — you'll love it.



ROLE SUMMARY

We are hiring one Front Office Administrator to handle patient communication, appointment booking, intake tracking, and provider scheduling.



A key part of the job is routing home visit appointments. You'll use Google Maps to evaluate patient addresses, compare drive times, and build efficient daily routes for multiple IBCLCs (lactation consultants) traveling across metro Atlanta.



This role requires native-level English clarity, accent, pronunciation, strong judgment, and comfort working in a high-volume clinical setting.



CORE RESPONSIBILITIES

 - Communications in Spruce: Manage inbound calls, texts, and messages

 - Scheduling in IntakeQ/PracticeQ: Schedule home, office, and telehealth appointments IntakeQ/PracticeQ following established workflows and insurance rules

 - Google Maps to route home visits efficiently:

...Enter addresses accurately

...Compare drive times and geographic proximity

...Fit appointments logically around existing visits

...Prevent backtracking and build efficient daily routes

...Reassign or escalate when routing is unclear

 - Build cohesive, accurate schedules for multiple IBCLCs across 10+ locations

 - Track patient intake form completion and flag for billing team the patients needing insurance verification

 - Explain basic insurance coverage to families (copays, coverage status, next steps)

 - Communicate with families warmly, clearly, and professionally

 - Identify urgent messages and escalate appropriately

 - Maintain high accuracy and attention to detail

 - Uphold HIPAA compliance and protect patient confidentiality



SCHEDULE

Full-time, 40 hours/week

Monday–Friday, 8:00 AM–5:00 PM Eastern Time (1-hour lunch)



TRAINING AND ONBOARDING

- Expect ~4 weeks of training before working independently

 - Training timeline is flexible with additional weeks available for training if needed — this is a complex role and we want you to feel confident

 - You will have ongoing support even after training



TIME OFF AND HOLIDAYS

 - Paid Christmas, New Year's Day, U.S. Thanksgiving off. We typically work the other US Holidays

 - Unpaid time off for Philippines holidays available with advance notice

 - We are understanding and flexible when tea
mbers are sick



SKILLS AND TECHNICAL REQUIREMENTS

 - Native-level English clarity and accent

 - Strong spatial reasoning and mapping ability (comfortable using Google Maps for routing decisions)

 - High accuracy with addresses and geographic comparison

 - Strong organizational skills and comfort with fast-paced workflows

 - Reliable judgment and ability to learn complex scheduling and insurance procedures

 - Tech-savvy with ability to navigate multiple systems simultaneously

 - Stable internet connection, quiet workspace, noise cancelling headset



EXPERIENCE

 - Prior experience working with a U.S. medical practice as healthcare VA or medical front office background

 - Basic understanding of U.S. insurance (copays, coinsurance, referrals, coverage distinctions) 

 - EMR experience

 - Dispatching, routing, or field-service scheduling experience strongly preferred

 - Experience supporting clinicians who perform home or mobile visits strongly preferred



COMPENSATION

 - Hourly Rate: Starting at up to $7.00 USD/hour, based on experience and English proficiency

 - Approximate Monthly (40 hrs/week): Up to $1,213 USD/month

 - 13th Month Pay: Provided (pro-rated during first year)

 - Pay increases available based on performance, typically reviewed after 90 days and annually



HOW TO APPLY

 - Please apply through OnlineJobs.ph only and include:

 - Links for your most current resume and 1-minute voice introduction message or video introduction sharing why you think you're a good fit

 - Your available start date

 - Applications that do not follow these instructions will not be considered

title: Capcut / TikTok Editor
description:
Part-time Capcut / TikTok Editor with potential for more



Hiring for part-time work for a Capcut / TikTok editor



You will be making TikTok videos using Capcut or the video editing software of your choice.  The editing process is fairly simple and straightforward.  Anyone who is proficient in video editing should have no problem with the basic tasks such as:

Cutting dead space in talking head videos

Adding overlay images on screen in the videos

Minor effects such as dynamic zoom, cropping, etc.

Producing b-roll content from voiceover and footage provided, having the ability to digest what is being said and pair up the audio with corresponding footage



Please review a few examples of my content to ensure you are familiar and comfortable with the editing style:

Basic talking head - here you are mostly editing dead space and piecing clips together, adding minor effects like crop and zoom to make the frames look more dynamic and seamless.







Talking head with overlays - same as before, but adding images provided to you on the screen to support what is being said in the video.











B-roll content - you will be provided a voice over and need to work through the footage to find fitting visuals. A strong understanding of English and social media content is crucial here.







You will be working hand in hand with me on an extremely viral social media page and there is room for bonuses if deadlines are met and the content performs well!



Requirements:

Attention to detail

STRONG English

Strong internet connection

Previous experience with Capcut / TikTok / Instagram

Good working with a team

Ability to learn and take constructive feedback

Availability to work 3-4h a day (with potential for more and increased salary)

Able to work 5-6 days per week (can take days off whenever as long as mostly consistent)

Can take payments through Wise

PH or similar time zone



$300/month + bonuses for 2-3h a day MAX and potential full time work in the future with a salary increase.



To apply, please complete the recreate assignment below so I can see your skills (1h max)



Below is a Google drive with the original files you will need to re-create this reference video:



Reference video: 



Google drive:







Please complete the following steps:

- Download the files and import into your video editing software

- Find the “good” takes of the footage and stitch together seamlessly 

- Add overlays and additional effects to the edited footage

- Pay close attention to detail in the selection of the clips, the pacing (duration of each scene), cropping, etc.

- Message me with a link to the re-created video

title: Civil Works Estimator & Project Sourcing Executive
description:
ROLE OVERVIEW



We are supporting our client in engaging an experienced Civil Works Estimator to support pre-construction and bidding activities for civil and infrastructure projects. This role focuses on accurate cost estimation, quantity take-offs, and project sourcing, with the ability to work directly from civil and structural drawings, including CAD files.

The Executive Partner (ExP) will operate as a dedicated offshore professional, embedded into the client’s workflows and systems, and supported by ArkLinc’s offshoring and outsourcing delivery model.



KEY RESPONSIBILITIES



Civil Estimating & Quantity Surveying

• Review and interpret civil, structural, and architectural drawings, including CAD files

• Break down drawings, BOQs, and project specifications to develop accurate cost estimates

• Perform detailed quantity take-offs for materials, labor, and equipment



Prepare estimates for:

• Earthworks / dirtworks

• Concrete works

• Asphalt works

• Road and bridge construction projects

• Validate project scopes, assumptions, and budgets in coordination with engineers or project managers

• Ensure estimates align with project requirements, industry standards, and best practices



Project Sourcing & Pre-Construction Support

• Support identification and tracking of potential civil and infrastructure projects

• Assist in bid preparation and pre-construction documentation

• Coordinate with suppliers, subcontractors, or internal teams as needed

• Maintain organized records of estimates, take-offs, and bid-related documents



Possible Executive Administrative Support (If Required)

• The Executive Partner is also assessed and capable of supporting executive administrative tasks if required by the client, subject to scope alignment, including:

• Calendar and
 management

• Meeting coordination and follow-ups

• Drafting reports, summaries, and internal documentation



TOOLS & SOFTWARE



The ideal candidate has experience or strong familiarity with:

• AGTEK (earthwork take-offs and modeling)

• Autodesk Civil 3D or equivalent CAD software

• Earthworks estimating software or similar tools

• Google Workspace and/or Microsoft Office 365

(All system and software access will be provided by the client. Training and on-boarding will be provided by the client.)



QUALIFICATIONS



Required:

• Proven experience as a Civil Estimator, Quantity Surveyor, or similar role

• Strong ability to read and interpret civil and structural drawings



Solid knowledge of:

• Concrete

• Asphalt

• Earthworks / dirtworks

• Familiarity with road and bridge construction projects

• Excellent attention to detail and analytical skills

• Strong written and verbal communication skills



PREFERRED QUALIFICATIONS

• Degree in Civil Engineering or related field

• Licensed Civil Engineer

• Experience supporting infrastructure or large-scale civil projects



IMPORTANT NOTES

• US-CST Time Zone

• We are endorsing one (1) qualified Executive Partner for this role

• Everyone is welcome to apply

• Applications must be submitted through the designated link

• COMMENTS WILL NOT BE ENTERTAINED



WHY JOIN US?

• Permanent WFH

• Earn competitive rates in USD

• HMO provided after qualifying period

• Bonuses and Allowances if qualified

• Rate increases (performance based)



TO APPLY visit ArkLinc in LinkedIn to see job post.

title: AI GIRL | Viral Social Media Video Copy/Creation
description:
YOU MUST READ THE WHOLE JOB AND COMPLETE TASK CORRECTLY FOR ME TO REPLY



Job Description — AI Viral Reel Copy / Generation (Part-Time)



I’m hiring a highly switched-on Virtual Assistant to help grow and scale AI-based social media accounts (AI girls) into real audiences and profitable private platforms.



This role is not basic editing and not casual work.



Your job is to understand why short-form content goes viral, translate those patterns into AI-generated reels using photos, and write copy that maximizes retention and conversions.



You’ll be working directly with me and my systems.



What you’ll be doing



Analyzing viral Instagram/TikTok reels to identify hooks, pacing, emotional triggers, and structure



Translating viral ideas into AI-ready shot concepts using still images



Writing scroll-stopping hooks, captions, and CTAs that fit a defined AI persona



Assisting with AI reel creation workflows (training and software provided)



Improving realism, retention, and believability of AI-generated content



Following a daily production schedule with consistency



What this role is (and is NOT)



This role IS:



Creative



Analytical



Pattern-based



Performance-driven



This role is NOT:



Heavy manual video editing



Guesswork



Inconsistent or casual work



Requirements (read carefully)



Available 1–2 hours per day, 7 days a week MINIMUM

No missed days — consistency matters



Strong understanding of short-form viral content



Ability to think in beats, 
nts, and attention



Comfortable learning and working with AI tools



Clear written communication



Willing to be tested before hiring



???? REQUIRED APPLICATION FILTER (IMPORTANT)



If you do not follow this exactly, your application will be ignored.



Step 1 — Start your message EXACTLY like this:



Attention beats editing.



(Yes — exactly like that, including the full stop.)



Step 2 — Answer this (bullet points only):



What makes someone stop scrolling in the first 2 seconds of a reel?



Rules:



Write 3 bullet points only



Each bullet must be one sentence



Do not mention tools, apps, or software



Focus on psychology, emotion, or timing



Step 3 — End your message with this exact sentence:



I can commit to 1–2 hours per day, 7 days a week.



Performance & rewards



You will be rewarded for viral performance



More hours and responsibility unlock as you prove value



Missed days, low-quality work, or sloppy execution = hours deducted



High performers grow quickly in this role



How to apply



Complete the application filter above.

Only candidates who pass will receive the next skills tests.



If you’re disciplined, creative, and serious about building something that scales — apply.

title: Growth Lead & Member Success Associate
description:
Summary

We are seeking a motivated Growth Lead & Member Success Associate to drive engagement and growth in our member community. The ideal candidate will have a passion for helping others succeed, a proven track record in enhancing member experiences and experience in lead generation. Responsibilities include developing growth strategies, onboarding new members, and providing support to ensure member satisfaction.



This role is ideal for someone who:

- Thrives on building and optimizing marketing systems that generate consistent, qualified leads

- Uses data to drive decisions and loves testing, measuring, and iterating

- Sees member success as the ultimate growth strategy

- Brings both strategic marketing thinking and hands-on execution excellence



Job description:



About Us



Spring Three is a boutique business consultancy helping boutique fitness studio owners build profitable, sustainable businesses. Through our flagship program and The Pilates Business Podcast, we provide systematic frameworks that support studio owners as they grow their business.



The Role



We're seeking a Growth Lead & Member Success Associate who excels at building scalable marketing systems while maintaining the human touch that defines our brand. You'll be the architect of Spring Three's visibility engine—driving lead generation, optimizing funnels, and expanding our reach across multiple channels—while ensuring every member feels supported and valued.



This role is ideal for someone who:



Thrives on building and optimizing marketing systems that generate consistent, qualified leads

Uses data to drive decisions and loves testing, measuring, and iterating

Sees member success as the ultimate growth strategy

Brings both strategic marketing thinking and hands-on execution excellence





Key Responsibilities



Support our evergreen funnels, lead magnets, and visibility initiatives across YouTube, podcast, social, and
 channels

Assist with launches, webinars, partner collaborations, and promotional campaigns from planning through execution

Track and report on key performance metrics related to member success, funnels, and visibility efforts

Improve systems and workflows to reduce manual work and enhance member experience

Serve as the primary point of contact for our program members, providing warm, timely, and strategic support across
, Slack, and community platforms

Conduct regular member check-in and discovery calls to guide progress, address challenges, and support retention

Maintain deep knowledge of all our offers, resources, and pathways to confidently direct members

Manage and coordinate program delivery, ensuring monthly resources and communications are delivered on time

Own and moderate private communities to foster engagement, clarity, and connection





Required Qualifications



3-5 years in growth marketing, digital marketing, funnel optimization, or demand generation

Proven track record building and scaling lead generation systems and marketing funnels

Experience with Kajabi, Google Analytics, Meta Ads, Canva, ManyChat (or similar platforms)

Strong copywriting skills with ability to create compelling marketing content

Experience with content repurposing, multi-channel distribution, and SEO strategies

Familiarity with podcast production, webinar platforms, and launch coordination

Customer success or community management experience preferred

Boutique fitness or online education industry experience strongly preferred

Has a “let’s figure this out” attitude





Benefits:



We’re a remote-first company

Flexible schedule

Full training and ongoing support

This is an Independent Contractor role

Application Instructions:



Note: If you have a business of your own that you plan to continue to grow, please do not apply. We are hiring a professional who wants to excel in a part-time role that provides worthwhile work and leads to additional growth opportunities in the future.



Our hiring process includes interviews, references and you will be expected to lean into a paid trial or paid project. If you join our team you can expect full training, ongoing support, a highly interactive work environment and a frequent review of your role and performance.



Job Type: Part-time



Benefits:



Flexible schedule

On-the-job training





Schedule: Must be available during USA ET Business Hours

title: EXPERIENCED SHORT FORM VIDEO EDITOR | Flexi Schedule
description:
We’re hiring someone who knows how to turn long-form content into sharp, high-retention short videos for platforms like TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts.



This role is for someone who understands pacing, hooks, and visual rhythm in short-form content, and knows how to edit with intention rather than just cutting clips.



—-----------------------------------------------------------------------------



READ THE ENTIRE JOB LISTING CAREFULLY. The final step of the hiring process will require the candidate to provide at least 1 former employer/team lead reference and at least 1 character reference. These will be verified prior to extending an offer.



--- ABOUT THE TEAM ---

Want to work in a rewarding, fast-paced, start-up atmosphere? Looking for significant growth and performance bonus opportunities? Have a growth mindset, value relationships, and dedicated to getting results? Then we might be a fit!



What is it like to work with us? HEAR FROM OUR TEAM!   





Our Core Values:

1) DELIGHT THE CLIENT:  We consistently exceed expectations by anticipating needs, delivering outstanding service, and creating those “magic 
nts” where every client feels seen and heard.

2) MASTER YOUR CRAFT:  We commit to continuous learning, share our expertise openly, and tackle every challenge with precision and a deep sense of duty.

3) FOLLOW THROUGH, ALWAYS:  When we say something will happen, it does—every time. We own every task, ensuring that nothing falls through the cracks, and when mistakes occur, we learn and improve immediately.



Our core values are important and the right candidate will share our values. We are building an awesome place to work, not just cutting together videos for our real estate business.



--- ABOUT YOU ---

Do you have strong creative instincts and know how to spot 
nts that make people stop scrolling? Are you proactive, adaptable, and detail-oriented? Do you have a sharp sense of pacing, an instinct for hooks, and a clear understanding of how short-form videos need to flow to hold attention? Do you take pride in clean edits and delivering videos that feel intentional and finished? Do our core values sound like a fit for who you are?



Then keep reading to see if we're a fit!



Responsibilities:

Short-Form Editing & Story Selection

- Review long-form videos, transcripts, or raw footage to identify short-form clip opportunities

- Select 
nts that are clear, engaging, and platform-appropriate

- Edit vertical videos optimized for TikTok, Instagram Reels, and YouTube Shorts

- Create strong hooks, clean cuts, and natural pacing

- Deliver publish-ready videos that meet brand and platform standards



Captions, Visuals & Formatting

- Add on-screen captions (burned-in or SRT as required) with proper timing and readability

- Apply basic motion, zooms, punch-ins, and visual emphasis where appropriate

- Follow platform-specific formatting (aspect ratio, duration, safe margins)



Iteration & Workflow

- Implement feedback efficiently and meet agreed turnaround times

- Maintain clear file naming and folder organization

- Track edits, revisions, and delivery status as required



Requirements:

- A STABLE, HIGH-SPEED INTERNET CONNECTION, REQUIRED (at least 150mbps)

- Experience with Final Cut Pro X (or other editing software, such as Adobe After Effects and Premiere Pro) is required

- Strong preference for MacOS users

- Experience editing short-form vertical content for social platforms, required

- Strong understanding of short-form pacing, hooks, and retention

- Experience working from transcripts or long-form content, required

- Clean file organization and understanding of post-production workflow

- Portfolio of completed short-form video projects, required

- General understanding of brand, content marketing, YouTube, etc, required

- GREAT interpersonal and communication skills, required

- Ability to self-start, work on a tight schedule, and manage multiple project deadlines, required

- Ability to follow directions and a LOVE of completing lots of projects according to consistent specifications, required

- Growth mindset, required



--- APPLICATION & RECRUITMENT PROCESS ---

STEP 1:

Fill out the application form through the link below and write "green kangaroo" in the Additional Comments field.


 



STEP 2:

Qualified candidates may be invited to participate in two PAID test projects, $10-20 USD for each test project estimated to be 2-3hrs of work for each (a total of $40 USD!).



STEP 3:

Candidates who advance through the test project rounds will be invited to an interview.



STEP 4:

Before extending a trial offer, we will conduct a CHARACTER REFERENCE CHECK for the final candidate(s). CONDUCTING A REFERENCE CHECK will be the last step in the hiring process.



STEP 5:

Upon receiving a trial offer, you will be onboarded as a Video Editor with a 90-day PAID trial period. During this period, we expect you to demonstrate your video editing expertise, meet project deadlines, be a team player, and excel at what you do. A successful trial will lead to a permanent offer to join the team.

title: Growth Lead & Member Success Associate
description:
Summary

We are seeking a motivated Growth Lead & Member Success Associate to drive engagement and growth in our member community. The ideal candidate will have a passion for helping others succeed, a proven track record in enhancing member experiences and experience in lead generation. Responsibilities include developing growth strategies, onboarding new members, and providing support to ensure member satisfaction.



This role is ideal for someone who:

- Thrives on building and optimizing marketing systems that generate consistent, qualified leads

- Uses data to drive decisions and loves testing, measuring, and iterating

- Sees member success as the ultimate growth strategy

- Brings both strategic marketing thinking and hands-on execution excellence



Job description:



About Us



Spring Three is a boutique business consultancy helping boutique fitness studio owners build profitable, sustainable businesses. Through our flagship program and The Pilates Business Podcast, we provide systematic frameworks that support studio owners as they grow their business.



The Role



We're seeking a Growth Lead & Member Success Associate who excels at building scalable marketing systems while maintaining the human touch that defines our brand. You'll be the architect of Spring Three's visibility engine—driving lead generation, optimizing funnels, and expanding our reach across multiple channels—while ensuring every member feels supported and valued.



This role is ideal for someone who:



Thrives on building and optimizing marketing systems that generate consistent, qualified leads

Uses data to drive decisions and loves testing, measuring, and iterating

Sees member success as the ultimate growth strategy

Brings both strategic marketing thinking and hands-on execution excellence





Key Responsibilities



Support our evergreen funnels, lead magnets, and visibility initiatives across YouTube, podcast, social, and
 channels

Assist with launches, webinars, partner collaborations, and promotional campaigns from planning through execution

Track and report on key performance metrics related to member success, funnels, and visibility efforts

Improve systems and workflows to reduce manual work and enhance member experience

Serve as the primary point of contact for our program members, providing warm, timely, and strategic support across
, Slack, and community platforms

Conduct regular member check-in and discovery calls to guide progress, address challenges, and support retention

Maintain deep knowledge of all our offers, resources, and pathways to confidently direct members

Manage and coordinate program delivery, ensuring monthly resources and communications are delivered on time

Own and moderate private communities to foster engagement, clarity, and connection





Required Qualifications



3-5 years in growth marketing, digital marketing, funnel optimization, or demand generation

Proven track record building and scaling lead generation systems and marketing funnels

Experience with Kajabi, Google Analytics, Meta Ads, Canva, ManyChat (or similar platforms)

Strong copywriting skills with ability to create compelling marketing content

Experience with content repurposing, multi-channel distribution, and SEO strategies

Familiarity with podcast production, webinar platforms, and launch coordination

Customer success or community management experience preferred

Boutique fitness or online education industry experience strongly preferred

Has a “let’s figure this out” attitude





Benefits:



We’re a remote-first company

Flexible schedule

Full training and ongoing support

This is an Independent Contractor role

Application Instructions:



Note: If you have a business of your own that you plan to continue to grow, please do not apply. We are hiring a professional who wants to excel in a part-time role that provides worthwhile work and leads to additional growth opportunities in the future.



Our hiring process includes interviews, references and you will be expected to lean into a paid trial or paid project. If you join our team you can expect full training, ongoing support, a highly interactive work environment and a frequent review of your role and performance.



Job Type: Part-time



Benefits:



Flexible schedule

On-the-job training





Schedule: Must be available during USA ET Business Hours

title: Growth & Outreach Manager (Content & Marketing)
description:
Role Overview



We’re looking for a self-motivated Growth & Outreach Manager to drive new client acquisition, build relationships, and fuel the growth engine of our content and marketing studio.



This role is ideal for someone who enjoys starting conversations, building trust, and turning relationships into opportunities. You’ll be responsible for lead generation, outreach, follow-ups, and helping move prospects into our content,
, and retainer funnels.



This is not a passive role. Success comes from initiative, consistency, and communication, not waiting for instructions.



What You’ll Do (Daily & Weekly Responsibilities)



Lead Generation & Outreach

- Research and identify 5–10 qualified businesses per day that align with our services

- Initiate conversations via DMs,
, comments, and networking platforms

- Personalize outreach based on each business’s needs and brand

- Maintain and update a lead tracker or CRM daily



Relationship Building & Follow-Up

- Nurture conversations with warm leads and past prospects

- Follow up on open conversations and proposals

- Build trust through helpful insights, content suggestions, and value-first messaging

- Help move leads into discovery calls,
 funnels, or retainer discussions



Funnel & List Growth

- Collect and organize new contacts into our
/CRM system

- Assist in distributing lead magnets, free audits, or content resources

- Track where leads come from and what messaging performs best



Collaboration & Reporting

- Share weekly insights on what outreach angles are working

- Flag high-potential leads for deeper conversations or pitches

- Collaborate with the content team to align messaging with growth goals



Who Will Succeed in This Role



This role is perfect for someone who is:

- Comfortable starting conversations (even with strangers)

- Consistent and organized — follows up without being reminded

- Curious about businesses and brands — asks smart questions

- Resilient — doesn’t take “no” personally

- Growth-minded — focused on results, not just activity



You don’t need to be “salesy.” You do need to be confident, proactive, and thoughtful.



Skills & Experience (Preferred, Not Required)



- Experience with outreach, sales, partnerships, or community management

- Familiarity with social platforms (Instagram, LinkedIn, TikTok,
)

- Comfortable using spreadsheets, Notion, or CRM tools

- Strong written communication skills

- Interest in content, branding, marketing, or creative businesses



How Success Is Measured

- Number of meaningful conversations started weekly

- Quality and consistency of follow-ups

- New leads added to the funnel

- Discovery calls or warm handoffs to the sales/content team

- Contribution to retainer package conversions



Why This Role Matters

Every brand deserves help growing — and this role is the front door to that growth.

You’re not just booking calls — you’re opening doors, starting relationships, and helping businesses take the next step forward.

title: Content Growth Editor (Video & Photo) – Marketing-Driven Storyteller
description:
Role Description



We’re a small but ambitious content and marketing business with a simple belief: every business deserves the help they need to grow.

By March 2026, our mission is to:



- Serve 20 new clients

- Sell 5 retainer packages

- Collect 500 new
/lead contacts into our funnel



This role is not about “just editing.”

It’s about using video and photo content as a growth engine.



What You’ll Actually Do

- Edit short-form and long-form video content optimized for Instagram, TikTok, YouTube,
, and landing pages

- Edit and enhance photo content for social, websites, and marketing campaigns

- Turn raw content into clear brand stories that attract, educate, and convert

- Understand why content is being made—not just how it looks

Help shape content that:

- Builds trust

- Drives inquiries

- Collects
s/leads

- Supports retainer sales



How You’ll Succeed in This Role

- You think beyond aesthetics and ask: “What is this supposed to do?”

- You understand that content = attention ? trust ? action

- You’re comfortable collaborating with strategists, clients, and creatives

- You can work fast without losing intention

- You take ownership of outcomes, not just deliverables



This Is NOT:

- A passive “wait for instructions” editing job

- A role for someone who only cares about visuals and not results

- A job for someone who dislikes feedback, iteration, or growth



The 3 Key Characteristics That Matter Most



1. Growth-Minded Creative

They understand that content exists to solve business problems, not just look cool.

They care about:

- Engagement

- Conversions

- Retention

- Results



They ask:

“How does this help the client grow?”



2. Ownership Mentality

They treat the mission like it’s their own business.

This person:

- Takes initiative

- Flags opportunities

- Suggests improvements

- Thinks ahead instead of waiting



They don’t say:

- “That’s not my job.”

They say:

- “Here’s how we can make this better.”



3. Adaptable + Curious

Marketing changes fast—and small businesses move even faster.

This person:

- Learns platforms quickly

- Adjusts to new formats, trends, and tools

- Isn’t married to one style or method

- Wants to get better every month



Curiosity > ego. Always.

title: Etsy Shop Manager: Skilled in Customer Service, Adobe Illustrator, and SEO
description:
We are a high-end Etsy brand that creates custom heirloom keepsakes. We are looking for an Etsy Shop Manager who will begin with order processing on Etsy/Printify, customer service, Adobe Illustrator formatting, and grow into listing optimization, SEO, and marketing support as they become familiar with our systems and brand. You will be trained on our systems, but we are looking for someone who can think independently, follow detailed processes, and take ownership of their responsibilities.

This is a long-term position for someone who wants to grow with a brand, not just complete tasks.



This role will begin at approximately 10-15 hours per week with opportunity to grow as responsibilities increase.



This position is not for you if:

You have only done basic admin or VA work and are unfamiliar with Etsy

You do NOT have Adobe Illustrator or experience in that platform

You are not detail-oriented

You are uncomfortable communicating with customers

You are looking for short-term work



Required:

Comfortable navigating Etsy orders, messages, and listings

Previous experience working inside an Etsy shop

Excellent written English and customer communication

Highly organized and detail-oriented

Basic to intermediate Adobe Illustrator skills (you will use this to process standard designs)

POD platforms such as Printify, Printful, Printed Mint, etc.

Canva Pro and mockups, and comfort working between Canva and Adobe Illustrator

3+ years of Instagram and
 experience



Bonus skills you will grow into over time: 

Etsy SEO strategy and tools such as Vela, Everbee, eRank, or Alura

Listing optimization and keyword research



Primary Role 1 – Etsy Operations and Customer Service (starting focus)

Process orders from the “New” folder

Send order confirmation messages using saved replies and edit name, item, and ship date

Organize orders into correct folders

Send photo follow-up messages

Send IG sneak peek message once design is ready

Send production and shipping confirmation message

Respond to 5-star reviews appropriately and flag any reviews under 4 stars

Use Adobe Illustrator to process standard customer designs once trained



Primary Role 2 – Marketing / Social Media Support

Etsy Marketing Support

Monitor rolling 24-hour sales and ensure they are scheduled a month in advance

Update shop announcement as needed

Instagram

Save high-quality review photos

Edit review photos

Create carousel posts of custom orders

Post sneak peeks to stories

Edit behind-the-scenes reels from provided content

Pinterest

Pin Etsy photos to Pinterest


Post products in relevant
 groups

Respond to comments with links



Primary Role 3 – Listing and Shop Support (as you grow)

Assist with optimizing Etsy listings

Keyword research and SEO support



How to Apply:



Use the subject line: Your New Etsy Ninja!!!



In your
, include the following in this exact order:

1. Introduce yourself and describe your direct experience working inside an Etsy shop.

2. Answer the following questions in detail:



A. Describe your process for automating or streamlining Etsy-related tasks such as order processing and messages.

B. Please write how you would respond to this customer review as the shop owner. “I was excited to receive this blanket because the design is beautiful and the personalization looked perfect in the preview. When it arrived, the names and date were correct, but the blanket itself feels thinner than I expected for the price. It’s not as soft as I imagined either. It looks more like a decorative throw than something cozy to use. Shipping was also a little slower than I thought it would be. Overall it’s nice, but I don’t feel like it was worth what I paid.”

C. What Etsy tools have you personally used? Explain what you use each one for in your workflow.

D. Please include samples of your Adobe Illustrator work or a portfolio link and describe your experience using Adobe Illustrator.

E. Why are you interested in working with a high-end custom keepsake brand long-term?



Applications that do not follow these instructions or skip any step will not be considered. This role will begin with customer service, shop support, and basic Adobe Illustrator design formatting. As trust builds, you will grow into marketing, listing optimization, and SEO. We are looking for someone long-term who wants to grow with the company.



Because this role involves access to proprietary systems, design templates, workflows, and our Etsy shop, shortlisted candidates will be required to sign a Non-Disclosure Agreement (NDA) before receiving the shop link or any internal materials. Respect for confidentiality and brand protection is essential for this role.

title: Google Ads and Social Media Ads Expert
description:
E-LAW PROFESSIONAL CORPORATION is a rapidly growing Canadian law firm. We are seeking to hire a Social Media Expert who will be responsible for the creation and management of all social media content coming out of the law practice for publication on
, LinkedIn, Youtube, Instagram, TikTok, etc..



Candidates must be able create & publish content, as well as use analysis and metrics to report on the results.



Previous working experience in Google Ads and Social Media Content Creation and/or Management with a Canadian, US, Australian/New Zealand, or British firm would be an advantage.

Please reply with a resume in .pdf format and cover letter in .pdf format.



Thank you.

title: Experienced Developer | Contract then full/part time
description:
About the Role

------------------------------------------------



Soapbox Design is looking for a sharp, reliable Developer who loves building beautiful, fast, and functional websites and who’s excited to grow with a creative studio that values clean structure, thoughtful design, and long-term client relationships.



This is a development-first role, ideal for someone who thrives on translating layouts into polished builds using WordPress and Shopify, with an eye for UX and front-end detail. Bonus points if you’ve worked closely alongside designers or bring strong interface sensibility.



Curiosity about AI, automation, and smart systems is expected, balanced with respect for structure, scope, and commercial outcomes.



Remote – AEST Hours 



Role Scope

------------------------------------------------



- Build fully responsive websites in WordPress (Elementor, ACF, custom themes)

- Develop custom layouts and sections in Shopify

- Translate Figma designs into live, mobile-first builds

- Implement opt-ins, forms, and automation tools such as Klaviyo and Go High Level

- Optimise websites for speed, SEO, accessibility, and performance

- Assist with QA, troubleshooting, and updates across client sites

- Collaborate with designers, marketers, and project managers to keep projects moving smoothly

- Provide clear handover notes at the completion of tasks or phases



Tools and Platforms

------------------------------------------------



Core Stack:

- WordPress (custom themes, Elementor, ACF)

- Shopify (theme customisation, templates, Liquid)

- Front-end: HTML, CSS, JavaScript

- Back-end: PHP, particularly for WordPress

- SEO and performance tools such as GTmetrix and PageSpeed Insights



Bonus Tools and Platforms

Awareness and familiarity are valued. Final tool selection follows Soapbox standards and project requirements.



- Klaviyo for template editing, form integration, and flows

- Go High Level for funnels, opt-ins, and automation

- Cursor, GitHub Copilot, Replit for AI-assisted development

- Framer or Webflow for rapid prototyping when approved

- ChatGPT, Claude, or Gemini for documentation, debugging, and workflow support

- LottieFiles, Vercel, Netlify as part of a modern web delivery stack



What Will Set You Up for Success 

------------------------------------------------

Essentials



Technical:

- Strong front-end skills in HTML, CSS, and JavaScript

- Solid PHP experience, especially within WordPress environments

- Theme and template development across WordPress and Shopify

- Experience integrating Klaviyo or Go High Level into marketing websites

- Strong understanding of mobile-first, accessible, responsive builds



Bonus: 

Practical use of AI tools in development workflows

Comfortable talking to clients or other tech teams if required.



Experience

------------------------------------------
+ years delivering production websites for paying clients (agency, freelance, or in-house)

- Proven experience building and maintaining high-quality websites

- Comfortable collaborating with designers on brand-led projects

- Understanding of lead generation, landing pages, and
 platform integrations



Essential Traits

------------------------------------------------

- Calm, consistent.

- Proactive communicator with strong accountability

- Solution-focused with client and commercial context in mind

- Detail-oriented with a strong eye for UX and performance

- Follows systems and escalates issues early when required

- Comfortable working remotely with asynchronous collaboration

- Asks clarifying questions early and documents handover clearly

- Curious, adaptable, and systems-aware



Strong Bonus Skills

------------------------------------------------

Klaviyo setup, template editing, and form integration

Go High Level automation and funnel experience

Light design or layout sensibility

Understanding of
 marketing and customer journey logic

Experience documenting or improving development workflows



Work Setup

------------------------------------------------

Fully remote, AEST-aligned hours

Start at 10–20 hours per week during probation

Opportunity to grow into part-time or full-time role.



All work tracked in ClickUp with time logged to task IDs

Collaboration via
, Teams, and shared folders



Soapbox Developer Task

------------------------------------------------

Brief Title



Premium Skincare Landing Page Build – WordPress or Shopify (Mobile-First)



Scenario



Soapbox has taken on a premium skincare brand launching a new brightening serum formulated using marine biotechnology. The product is high-end, priced at $120, and designed for women aged 35–55 seeking firmer, more radiant skin.



You will receive a basic Figma wireframe showing structure only, along with placeholder copy. Your task is to build a clean, responsive, mobile-first landing page that feels luxurious, trustworthy, and science-backed, and is optimised for conversion and opt-in.



You may use WordPress (Elementor plus ACF) or Shopify (Dawn theme or similar), depending on your strengths.



Task



Build a mobile-first landing page that includes:

Hero section with headline, subheadline, CTA button, and image

Short intro explaining the benefits of marine-derived skincare

Three to five clearly listed product benefits


 opt-in form such as “Join the waitlist for exclusive early access”

Placeholder for a 30–60 second product video embed

Testimonial or quote section to build trust

Optional placeholder branding, colours, or typography reflecting a premium tone



Deliverables



Provide:

A Loom video, maximum 10 minutes, covering:

Your development environment and tool choices

Your process from wireframe to live preview

How you structured responsiveness and performance

How the build could scale into a campaign or product page

Any assumptions or challenges you identified



A preview link or screen recording of the working page

Access to code or theme files via GitHub, zip, or sandbox

Screenshots of desktop and mobile layouts



Bonus Questions



Answer briefly via Loom or text:

What AI tools did you use or consider for this build?

What additional brief details would you request before starting a real Soapbox project?

If you had four more hours, what would you polish or extend?

Have you implemented Klaviyo or Go High Level integrations before? How would that apply here?



Notes



This task is designed to show how you think, build, and communicate

We are looking for a clean, modular, professional result, not perfection

Reusing components or starter kits is encouraged

Submit within two to three days unless otherwise agreed

title: Virtual Assistant – Video Editor, Content Creator & Graphic Designer (Part-Time, Remote)
description:

 content

, YouTube, TikTok, etc.)
